comment.author: 92747288@N03
comment._content: Corner of Davey Street & Salamanca Place, Hobart

comment.author: 99479038@N00
comment._content:
Davey Street to the left, Salamanca Place to the right, photo taken looking East.

The building was formerly St Mary's Hospital, and then occupied by the Lands and Survey Department until the mid 1970s.
